snippet: Mr. Mitchell, a founder of the Dance Theater of Harlem, and Mr. Davis, the founder of the DanceAfrica festival, will be recognized for their contributions to the world of dance.
abstract: Mr. Mitchell, a founder of the Dance Theater of Harlem, and Mr. Davis, the founder of the DanceAfrica festival, will be recognized for their contributions to the world of dance.

headline.main: Bessie Awards to Honor Arthur Mitchell and Chuck Davis
